comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Walter Eyre Lambert--wife of a doctor at the New York Eye and Ear Infirmary, secretary of the Infirmary's Women's Auxiliary Board. Mary Hurst Purnell Gould--socialite from Baltimore, wife of philanthropist Dr. Elgin R. L. Gould (1860-1915) George Frederick Kunz (1856-1932), German mineralogist based in New York City: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Frederick_Kunz William Fellowes Morgan Sr.(1861-1943): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Fellowes_Morgan,_Sr. Mrs. H. P. Davidson it says on the original caption, not Davison.

comment._content: Thanks for catching the typo. We'll fix it when we update the record.
